attributes.action: run the e-petition system with open source software.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the e-petition system were run using open source software, it is likely that many more people would use it.  Furthermore, this would increase the level of trust in the system.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
